subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: As in years past, and barring injuries and trades, the Nets’ fortunes will rise and fall on the solid play and not-always-perfect health of Jason Kidd, Vince Carter and Richard Jefferson.
snippet: As in years past, and barring injuries and trades, the Nets’ fortunes will rise and fall on the solid play and not-always-perfect health of Jason Kidd, Vince Carter and Richard Jefferson.
